channel.title: Docs on Ceres doc
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Ceres doc

item.title: App Container
item.description: App Container # Quickly open the iOS application container directory. The most recent applications will be on the list as shown. Simply click on the app icon to open the app container directory. Home

item.title: Overlay
item.description: Overlay # Display an overlay image directly on top of the simulator and compare the design with the actual developed screen. Click the “Open” button as indicate in the image below For the first time, you may need to grant accesibility from the privacy settings Otherwise, skip to step 4 Restart the application Browse to the design image to compare Click “snap” to automatically align the overlay window on top of the previous active simulator window.

item.title: Simulators
item.description: Simulators # This section contains several utilities to work with the simulator selected in the box: Open url as deeplink or universal link Open the simulator’s log directory Record a video via simctl Home
